video_prompt: Anime character with long, flowing green hair dances playfully. Her voluminous white blouse sleeves subtly sway. The lacing on her corset tightens and loosens with her movement. Her pleated skirt spins as she twirls, causing decorative chains and charms on her belt and garter to jingle. Her tall, laced boots tap rhythmically. Her hands elegantly gesture in sync with her movements, fingers curling gracefully.
image_prompt: **Concise Prompt:** Full-body anime character, female, dark background. Intricate fantasy/steampunk fashion: long green hair, white ruffled blouse with voluminous sleeves, dark green laced corset, pleated dark green skirt with gold trim and floral embroidery. Detailed brown belt with turquoise gemstone buckle and dangling charms/chains. Elaborate dark garter with turquoise gemstones and chains on right thigh. Tall dark brown lace-up boots with metalwork. Elegant hand pose. Meticulously designed, detailed clothing and accessories. Subdued lighting. Sorceress/adventurer aesthetic.
refined_video_prompt: A playful anime character dances, her hair flowing dynamically. Blouse sleeves subtly sway. Corset lacing tightens and loosens with her movement. Her skirt spins rapidly as she twirls, causing chains and charms to jingle. Boots tap rhythmically. Hands gesture elegantly, fingers curling gracefully in sync with her movements.
